{"name": "Self-Service DTA Kiosk at Berkshire Bank Building (Walk-in)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "**SERVICES**
* There is an official Department of Transitional Assistance Kiosk at this location with access to the DTA Connect mobile application and website, scanners, copiers and phones. [Learn what you can do through DTA Connect.](https://www.mass.gov/guides/how-to-contact-dta)

***PLEASE NOTE:***
DTA staff will be available every Tuesday from 8:45am - 5:00pm.

", "email": "", "url": "https://www.mass.gov/locations/self-service-dta-kiosk-at-berkshire-bank-building", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "37 Main Street", "address_2": "#5", "city": "North Adams", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "01247", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.6996346, "longitude": -73.1131857}, "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:45", "closes_at": "21:00"}]}
